name: Upstream Marketing
description:
Upstream Marketing (www.upstreammarketing.net) is a website design company in Houston Texas with full-time designers and programmers serving clients in the Houston and surrounding areas since 1999. Upstream Marketing is the industrial division of Zephyr Salvo Studios.
Upstream Marketing and Zephyr Salvo Studios was ranked as one of the top 25 website design companies in Houston, TX by the Houston Business Journal for the last 7 years.
Upstream Marketing specializes in Industrial website design for a variety of industries including Oil & Gas, New Energy, Steel, Mining, Training, Petrochemical, Commercial Construction, Pipeline, Underground Utility Construction, Pulp and Paper, Offshore Diving, Commercial Diving, Welding, Tools, Tool Repair, Hydraulic Equipment, Offshore Oil & Gas, Shale Drilling, Natural Gas, Eagle Ford Shale and more.Upstream Marketing provides Custom Web Design, Ecommerce Web Design, Logo Design, Mobile Web Design, Website Redesign, PHP Application Development, ASP Application Development, ASP.Net Development, Custom Shopping Cart, WordPress Development and Customization, SEO Services, Keyword Analysis, Meta Tag Creation, Content Optimization, MODX Content Management Programming, Search Engine Submission, Cross Browser Compatible Web Design, IPAD and Tablet friendly web design.
